argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mgpsumunsn.m | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 2 |  | mgpsumunsn.t | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 3 |  | mgpsumunsn.r | |- ( ph -> R e. CRing ) |
| 4 |  | mgpsumunsn.n | |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) |
| 5 |  | mgpsumunsn.i | |- ( ph -> I e. N ) |
| 6 |  | mgpsumunsn.a | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. N ) -> A e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 7 |  | mgpsumunsn.x | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 8 |  | mgpsumunsn.e | |- ( k = I -> A = X ) |
| 9 |  | #P_difsnid | |- ( I e. N -> ( ( N \ { I } ) u. { I } ) = N ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( ( N \ { I } ) u. { I } ) = N ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ph -> N = ( ( N \ { I } ) u. { I } ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_mpteq1d | |- ( ph -> ( k e. N |-> A ) = ( k e. ( ( N \ { I } ) u. { I } ) |-> A ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. N |-> A ) ) = ( M gsum ( k e. ( ( N \ { I } ) u. { I } ) |-> A ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` M ) |
| 16 | 1, 2 | #P_mgpplusg | |- .x. = ( +g ` M ) |
| 17 | 1 | #P_crngmgp | |- ( R e. CRing -> M e. CMnd ) |
| 18 | 3, 17 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> M e. CMnd ) |
| 19 |  | #P_diffi | |- ( N e. Fin -> ( N \ { I } ) e. Fin ) |
| 20 | 4, 19 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( N \ { I } ) e. Fin ) |
| 21 |  | #P_eldifi | |- ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) -> k e. N ) |
| 22 | 21, 6 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( N \ { I } ) ) -> A e. ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 23 |  | #P_neldifsnd | |- ( ph -> -. I e. ( N \ { I } ) ) |
| 24 | 15, 16, 18, 20, 22, 5, 23, 7, 8 | #P_gsumunsn | |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. ( ( N \ { I } ) u. { I } ) |-> A ) ) = ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) .x. X ) ) |
| 25 | 13, 24 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ph -> ( M gsum ( k e. N |-> A ) ) = ( ( M gsum ( k e. ( N \ { I } ) |-> A ) ) .x. X ) ) |
